document_data.caption: Monster Manual v.3.5
document_data.title: Monster Manual
document_data.author: [[Skip Williams]], [[Jonathan Tweet]], [[Monte Cook]]
document_data.mainbody:
allery>
Wp2drag 1024x768.jpg|''Promotional wallpaper.''
Wp3mons 1024x768.jpg|''Promotional wallpaper.''
Monster Manual v.3.5 Back Cover.jpg|''Back Cover.''
Monster Manual v.3.5 Premium Edition Cover.jpg|''Premium Edition cover.''
Monster Manual v.3.5 Premium Edition Back Cover.jpg|''Premium Edition back cover.''
</gallery>
document_data.Contents:
* Introduction
* Chapter 1: Monsters A to Z
* Chapter 2: Animals
* Chapter 3: Vermin
* Chapter 4: Improving Monsters
* Chapter 5: Making Monsters
* Chapter 6: Monster Skills and Feats
* Chapter 7: Glossary
document_data.Description:
''Monster Manual v.3.5'' has a slightly different entry on each monster than ''[[Monster Manual 3rd edition]]''. Notably, each monster's attack has been divided into attack and full attack entries. Some creatures from the ''[[Psionics Handbook]]'' and the ''[[Manual of the Planes 3rd edition|Manual of the Planes]]'' were added. Further revision included the addition of an enhanced version of most monsters as an example of advancement (usually either with a template or with class levels). Many monsters also included instructions on how to use them as player characters. 

''Monster Manual v.3.5'' was reproduced as a premium reprint on September 18, 2012.
